title: Ticket #1988: quill fails due to duplicate key
description:
Steve Timm reports seeing the following error in the quill log: 

03/17 15:01:54 SQL COMMAND: INSERT INTO ClusterAds_Horizontal (scheddname,
cluster_id) VALUES ('hostname.edited', '2726591')
03/17 15:01:54 [SQL EXECUTION ERROR2] ERROR:  duplicate key value violates
unique constraint "clusterads_horizontal_pkey"

The job in question has already finished. Updates fail until job_queue.log rotates.

Steve notes that this error happened in conjunction with a reboot of the machines. In this case the condor_schedd/condor_quill machine rebooted and came back up before the postgres server was rebooted.

Theory: perhaps an update to the db succeeded to modify the db but failed to consume this entry from the sql log, leaving behind a record that causes all subsequent updates to fail.

Suggested workaround: manually remove conflicting entries from the db.
